author: jeremias
msg: Using Joe's new "relativebase" feature, this file can be simplified.

author: jeremias
msg: New feature for the Ant task: relativebase="true" uses the directory of each FO-file in a fileset as basedir. This is in contrast to the general basedir parameter.
